sentences: The IPCC Inventories Task Force Bureau reported on progress in compiling the IPCC 2006 Guidelines for Greenhouse Gas Inventories.
KENYA emphasized that 'aggressive mitigation' is required by Annex I Parties.
NORWAY said the greenhouse gas inventory review process is a capacity-building activity beneficial to all Parties.
Chair Benrageb said Helen Plume (New Zealand) and Branca Americano (Brazil) would conduct informal consultations on the matter.
enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
